pullRequest.title: impr open search desc
pullRequest.bodyText:
seems the 'filter' string is not suggested by TG, in stead use {searchTerm?}
/searchhtml?any= currently does not return html, but xml, so using general html search for now, for html results

nodes.bodyText: I'm not really sure the changed url is a valid one, have you try it?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -71,14 +71,14 @@
           <Url type="application/xml" rel="results">
             <xsl:attribute name="template">
               <xsl:value-of
-                select="concat($baseUrl,/root/gui/url,'/opensearch/', /root/gui/language, '/', /root/response/fileId,'/search?any={filter}')"/>
+                select="concat($baseUrl,/root/gui/url,'/opensearch/', /root/gui/language, '/', /root/response/fileId,'/search?any={searchTerms?}')"/>
             </xsl:attribute>
           </Url>
 
           <Url type="text/html" rel="results">
             <xsl:attribute name="template">
               <xsl:value-of
-                select="concat($baseUrl,/root/gui/url,'/opensearch/', /root/gui/language, '/', /root/response/fileId,'/searchhtml?any={filter}')"/>
+                select="concat($baseUrl,/root/gui/url,'/opensearch/', /root/gui/language, '/catalog.search#/search?any={searchTerms?}')"/>

commit.message: fix opensearch url, as suggested by @josegar74

nodes.bodyText:
The url created now is http://localhost:8080/geonetwork/search?any={searchTerms?}, that service doesn't exist.
The purpose of this link is to display the html search results?
To show the standard search results page, the url format should be:

http://localhost:8080/geonetwork/srv/eng/catalog.search#/search?any={searchTerms?}

I see it's also configured this urlrewrite rule:

http://localhost:8080/geonetwork/srv/eng/opensearch/htmlsearch?q=QUERYVALUE -->
http://localhost:8080/geonetwork/srv/eng/catalog.search#/search?any=QUERYVALUE

Any of the formats should work, please update the PR to fix it.

commit.message: fix url, use htmlsearch, forwards to /catalog.search, but can easily be re-routed
